hmmwv_tow.description: This is the classical "High Mobility Multipurpose Wheeled Vehicle" used by the US military since 1985. It features some protection agains small arms fire. This variant features a TOW rocket launcher against medium armored targets like APCs.

us_infantry_rifles.description: The standard US Army infantry squad consists of two fireteams with each 4 soldiers. This unit has modern assault rifles and grenades at its disposal and relies on tactics refined trough hundreds of hours of both real combat and training.

us_marines_javelin.description: A Marines Javelin Missile squad consisting of eight marines with two antiarmor Javelin Missile systems. They can take out even heavy armored tanks but need shielding against infantry threats.

m2a3_bradley.description: The Bradley Infantry Fighting Vehicle is a light armored vehicle that supports armored units and infantry. It features a M242 Bushmaster 25mm cannon and TOW missiles against armored targets. It can transport six soldiers across the battlefield, even crossing rivers.

us_truck_cargo_general.description: The MTVR, or Medium Tactical Vehicle Replacement series of vehicles is the mainstay of medium trucks for the US armed forces. This version is fitted for general cargo transport, sporting a flat bed. It can transport all kinds of cargo and has a armored cabin to protect crew and engine. This makes it a perfect fit to supply fighting units.

militia_rifles.description: When the local warlord decided to support the Taliban, these villagers mobilized. A group consists of about 10-15 people. Arming themselves with weapons such as soviet assault rifles, hand-down WW2 relicts and home-made grenades, they have various levels of training. Some never fired a shot before. They lack tactics and equipment, being always low on ammo.

taliban_heavy_weapons.description: Having received some formal training at a secret camp in the mountains, these 9 men lack the drill and tactics, but else pass as soldiers. They have some standard equipment, soviet-era RPG missiles and launcher as well as at least one machinegunner.

taliban_heavy_tank.description: For the rare case of an open asault, if heavy resistance is encountered or a show of force seems necessary, this monstrosity from the cold war is rolled out its hiding place. It breaks down frequently, the armor is no match for modern AT weaponry, but it sure makes a lot of noise!

refugees.description: A civilian treck of women, men and children who have just been able to flee from the battles, bringing some of their belongings with them. Some also brought small arms for hunting and self defense, but they can't realistically hope to do more than deter wild dogs or a lone criminal on the road.
